body_html:
@apaszke Do have a decision on sorting as mentioned in the issue 3584? Do I need to handle that in the pad_sequence function? And I was having second thoughts about the acceptable dimensions? What all should be accepted.

  • batch x seq_len x feature_len (batch will be 1 in most cases)
  • seq_len x batch x feature_len (batch will be 1 in most cases)
  • seq_len x feature_len
  • more than 3 dimensions

Is this feature going into 0.3 release?

batch x seq_len x feature_len (batch will be 1 in most cases)
seq_len x batch x feature_len (batch will be 1 in most cases)
seq_len x feature_len
more than 3 dimensions

Is this feature going into 0.3 release?
body:
@apaszke Do have a decision on sorting as mentioned in the issue 3584? Do I need to handle that in the `pad_sequence` function? And I was having second thoughts about the acceptable dimensions? What all should be accepted.
- batch `x` seq_len `x` feature_len (batch will be 1 in most cases)
- seq_len `x` batch `x` feature_len (batch will be 1 in most cases)
- seq_len `x` feature_len
- more than 3 dimensions

Is this feature going into 0.3 release?
